Main.Menu:
1| Create a new backup  
 2| Remove a backup  
 3| Start a save  
 4| Start all available backup processes  
 5| View backup details  
 6| Exit

Save.Name: Enter the name of your save
Save.PathSave: Enter the path of the file to save
Save.PathDestination: Enter the path of the destination
Save.SaveType: Enter the type of save(0 : All files / 1 : Changed files)
